Sanskit Text: अग्निमीळे पुरोहितं यज्ञस्य देवं रत्वीजम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aghnimīḷe purohitaṃ yajñasya devaṃ ṛtvījam |
Translation: 1 I Laud Agni, the chosen Priest, God, minister of sacrifice,

Sanskit Text: होतारं रत्नधातमम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: hotāraṃ ratnadhātamam ||
Translation: The hotar, lavishest of wealth.

Sanskit Text: अग्निः पूर्वेभिर्र्षिभिरीड्यो नूतनैरुत |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aghniḥ pūrvebhirṛṣibhirīḍyo nūtanairuta |
Translation: 2 Worthy is Agni to be praised by living as by ancient seers.

Sanskit Text: स देवानेह वक्षति ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sa devāneha vakṣati ||
Translation: He shall bring hitherward the Gods.

Sanskit Text: अग्निना रयिमश्नवत पोषमेव दिवे-दिवे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aghninā rayimaśnavat poṣameva dive-dive |
Translation: 3 Through Agni man obtaineth wealth, yea, plenty waxing day by day,

Sanskit Text: यशसं वीरवत्तमम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: yaśasaṃ vīravattamam ||
Translation: Most rich in heroes, glorious.

Sanskit Text: अग्ने यं यज्ञमध्वरं विश्वतः परिभूरसि |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aghne yaṃ yajñamadhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūrasi |
Translation: 4 Agni, the perfect sacrifice which thou encompassest about

Sanskit Text: स इद्देवेषु गछति ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sa iddeveṣu ghachati ||
Translation: Verily goeth to the Gods.

Sanskit Text: अग्निर्होता कविक्रतुः सत्यश्चित्रश्रवस्तमः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aghnirhotā kavikratuḥ satyaścitraśravastamaḥ |
Translation: 5 May Agni, sapient-minded Priest, truthful, most gloriously great,

Sanskit Text: देवो देवेभिरा गमत ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: devo devebhirā ghamat ||
Translation: The God, come hither with the Gods.

Sanskit Text: यदङग दाशुषे तवमग्ने भद्रं करिष्यसि |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yadaṅgha dāśuṣe tvamaghne bhadraṃ kariṣyasi |
Translation: 6 Whatever blessing, Agni, thou wilt grant unto thy worshipper,

Sanskit Text: तवेत तत सत्यमङगिरः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tavet tat satyamaṅghiraḥ ||
Translation: That, Aṅgiras, is indeed thy truth.

Sanskit Text: उप तवाग्ने दिवे-दिवे दोषावस्तर्धिया वयम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: upa tvāghne dive-dive doṣāvastardhiyā vayam |
Translation: 7 To thee, dispeller of the night, O Agni, day by day with prayer

Sanskit Text: नमो भरन्त एमसि ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: namo bharanta emasi ||
Translation: Bringing thee reverence, we come

Sanskit Text: राजन्तमध्वराणां गोपां रतस्य दीदिविम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: rājantamadhvarāṇāṃ ghopāṃ ṛtasya dīdivim |
Translation: 8 Ruler of sacrifices, guard of Law eternal, radiant One,

Sanskit Text: वर्धमानंस्वे दमे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: vardhamānaṃsve dame ||
Translation: Increasing in thine own abode.

Sanskit Text: स नः पितेव सूनवे.अग्ने सूपायनो भव |
Sanskrit Transliteration: sa naḥ piteva sūnave.aghne sūpāyano bhava |
Translation: 9 Be to us easy of approach, even as a father to his son:

Sanskit Text: सचस्वा नः सवस्तये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sacasvā naḥ svastaye ||
Translation: Agni, be with us for our weal.

Sanskit Text: वायवा याहि दर्शतेमे सोमा अरंक्र्ताः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: vāyavā yāhi darśateme somā araṃkṛtāḥ |
Translation: 1 BEAUTIFUL Vāyu, come, for thee these Soma drops have been prepared:

Sanskit Text: तेषां पाहि शरुधी हवम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: teṣāṃ pāhi śrudhī havam ||
Translation: Drink of them, hearken to our call.

Sanskit Text: वाय उक्थेभिर्जरन्ते तवामछा जरितारः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: vāya ukthebhirjarante tvāmachā jaritāraḥ |
Translation: 2 Knowing the days, with Soma juice poured forth, the singers glorify

Sanskit Text: सुतसोमा अहर्विदः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sutasomā aharvidaḥ ||
Translation: Thee, Vāyu, with their hymns of praise.

Sanskit Text: वायो तव परप्र्ञ्चती धेना जिगाति दाशुषे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: vāyo tava prapṛñcatī dhenā jighāti dāśuṣe |
Translation: 3 Vāyu, thy penetrating stream goes forth unto the worshipper,

Sanskit Text: उरूची सोमपीतये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: urūcī somapītaye ||
Translation: Far-spreading for the Soma draught.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रवायू इमे सुता उप परयोभिरा गतम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indravāyū ime sutā upa prayobhirā ghatam |
Translation: 4 These, Indra-Vāyu, have been shed; come for our offered dainties’ sake:

Sanskit Text: इन्दवो वामुशन्ति हि ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indavo vāmuśanti hi ||
Translation: The drops are yearning for you both.

Sanskit Text: वायविन्द्रश्च चेतथः सुतानां वाजिनीवसू |
Sanskrit Transliteration: vāyavindraśca cetathaḥ sutānāṃ vājinīvasū |
Translation: 5 Well do ye mark libations, ye Vāyu and Indra, rich in spoil!

Sanskit Text: तावा यातमुप दरवत ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tāvā yātamupa dravat ||
Translation: So come ye swiftly hitherward.

Sanskit Text: वायविन्द्रश्च सुन्वत आ यातमुप निष्क्र्तम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: vāyavindraśca sunvata ā yātamupa niṣkṛtam |
Translation: 6 Vāyu and Indra, come to what the Soma-presser hath prepared:

Sanskit Text: मक्ष्वित्था धिया नरा ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: makṣvitthā dhiyā narā ||
Translation: Soon, Heroes, thus I make my prayer.

Sanskit Text: मित्रं हुवे पूतदक्षं वरुणं च रिशादसम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: mitraṃ huve pūtadakṣaṃ varuṇaṃ ca riśādasam |
Translation: 7 Mitra, of holy strength, I call, and foe-destroying Varuṇa,

Sanskit Text: धियं घर्ताचीं साधन्ता ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: dhiyaṃ ghṛtācīṃ sādhantā ||
Translation: Who make the oil-fed rite complete.

Sanskit Text: रतेन मित्रावरुणाव रताव्र्धाव रतस्प्र्शा |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ṛtena mitrāvaruṇāv ṛtāvṛdhāv ṛtaspṛśā |
Translation: 8 Mitra and Varuṇa, through Law, lovers and cherishers of Law,

Sanskit Text: करतुं बर्हन्तमाशाथे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: kratuṃ bṛhantamāśāthe ||
Translation: Have ye obtained your might power

Sanskit Text: कवी नो मित्रावरुणा तुविजाता उरुक्षया |
Sanskrit Transliteration: kavī no mitrāvaruṇā tuvijātā urukṣayā |
Translation: 9 Our Sages, Mitra-Varuṇa, wide dominion, strong by birth,

Sanskit Text: दक्षं दधाते अपसम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: dakṣaṃ dadhāte apasam ||
Translation: Vouchsafe us strength that worketh well.

Sanskit Text: अश्विना यज्वरीरिषो दरवत्पाणी शुभस पती |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aśvinā yajvarīriṣo dravatpāṇī śubhas patī |
Translation: 1 YE Aśvins, rich in treasure, Lords of splendour, having nimble hands,

Sanskit Text: पुरुभुजाचनस्यतम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: purubhujācanasyatam ||
Translation: Accept the sacrificial food.

Sanskit Text: अश्विना पुरुदंससा नरा शवीरया धिया |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aśvinā purudaṃsasā narā śavīrayā dhiyā |
Translation: 2 Ye Aśvins, rich in wondrous deeds, ye heroes worthy of our praise,

Sanskit Text: धिष्ण्या वनतं गिरः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: dhiṣṇyā vanataṃ ghiraḥ ||
Translation: Accept our songs with mighty thought.

Sanskit Text: दस्रा युवाकवः सुता नासत्या वर्क्तबर्हिषः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: dasrā yuvākavaḥ sutā nāsatyā vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
Translation: 3 Nāsatyas, wonder-workers, yours are these libations with clipt grass:

Sanskit Text: आ यातंरुद्रवर्तनी ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ā yātaṃrudravartanī ||
Translation: Come ye whose paths are red with flame.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रा याहि चित्रभानो सुता इमे तवायवः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indrā yāhi citrabhāno sutā ime tvāyavaḥ |
Translation: 4 O Indra marvellously bright, come, these libations long for thee,

Sanskit Text: अण्वीभिस्तना पूतासः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: aṇvībhistanā pūtāsaḥ ||
Translation: Thus by fine fingers purified.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रा याहि धियेषितो विप्रजूतः सुतावतः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indrā yāhi dhiyeṣito viprajūtaḥ sutāvataḥ |
Translation: 5 Urged by the holy singer, sped by song, come, Indra, to the prayers,

Sanskit Text: उप बरह्माणि वाघतः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: upa brahmāṇi vāghataḥ ||
Translation: Of the libation-pouring priest.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रा याहि तूतुजान उप बरह्माणि हरिवः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indrā yāhi tūtujāna upa brahmāṇi harivaḥ |
Translation: 6 Approach, O Indra, hasting thee, Lord of Bay Horses, to the prayers.

Sanskit Text: सुते दधिष्वनश्चनः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sute dadhiṣvanaścanaḥ ||
Translation: In our libation take delight.

Sanskit Text: ओमासश्चर्षणीध्र्तो विश्वे देवास आ गत |
Sanskrit Transliteration: omāsaścarṣaṇīdhṛto viśve devāsa ā ghata |
Translation: 7 Ye Viśvedevas, who protect, reward, and cherish men, approach

Sanskit Text: दाश्वांसो दाशुषः सुतम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: dāśvāṃso dāśuṣaḥ sutam ||
Translation: Your worshipper's drink-offering.

Sanskit Text: विश्वे देवासो अप्तुरः सुतमा गन्त तूर्णयः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: viśve devāso apturaḥ sutamā ghanta tūrṇayaḥ |
Translation: 8 Ye Viśvedevas, swift at work, come hither quickly to the draught,

Sanskit Text: उस्रा इवस्वसराणि ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: usrā ivasvasarāṇi ||
Translation: As milch-kine hasten to their stalls.

Sanskit Text: विश्वे देवासो अस्रिध एहिमायासो अद्रुहः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: viśve devāso asridha ehimāyāso adruhaḥ |
Translation: 9 The Viśvedevas, changing shape like serpents, fearless, void of guile,

Sanskit Text: मेधं जुषन्त वह्नयः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: medhaṃ juṣanta vahnayaḥ ||
Translation: Bearers, accept the sacred draught

Sanskit Text: पावका नः सरस्वती वाजेभिर्वाजिनीवती |
Sanskrit Transliteration: pāvakā naḥ sarasvatī vājebhirvājinīvatī |
Translation: 10 Wealthy in spoil, enriched with hymns, may bright

Sanskit Text: <a href="errata.htm#0">
Sarasvatī
desire,
यज्ञं वष्टु धियावसुः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: yajñaṃ vaṣṭu dhiyāvasuḥ ||
Translation: With eager love, our sacrifice.

Sanskit Text: चोदयित्री सून्र्तानां चेतन्ती सुमतीनाम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: codayitrī sūnṛtānāṃ cetantī sumatīnām |
Translation: 11 Inciter of all pleasant songs, inspirer of all gracious thought,

Sanskit Text: यज्ञं दधे सरस्वती ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: yajñaṃ dadhe sarasvatī ||
Translation: Sarasvatī accept our rite

Sanskit Text: महो अर्णः सरस्वती पर चेतयति केतुना |
Sanskrit Transliteration: maho arṇaḥ sarasvatī pra cetayati ketunā |
Translation: 12 Sarasvatī, the mighty flood,—she with her light illuminates,

Sanskit Text: धियो विश्वा वि राजति ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: dhiyo viśvā vi rājati ||
Translation: She brightens every pious thought.

Sanskit Text: सुरूपक्र्त्नुमूतये सुदुघामिव गोदुहे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: surūpakṛtnumūtaye sudughāmiva ghoduhe |
Translation: 1 As a good cow to him who milks, we call the doer of fair deeds,

Sanskit Text: जुहूमसि दयवि-दयवि ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: juhūmasi dyavi-dyavi ||
Translation: To our assistance day by day.

Sanskit Text: उप नः सवना गहि सोमस्य सोमपाः पिब |
Sanskrit Transliteration: upa naḥ savanā ghahi somasya somapāḥ piba |
Translation: 2 Come thou to our libations, drink of Soma; Soma-drinker thou!

Sanskit Text: गोदा इद रेवतोमदः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ghodā id revatomadaḥ ||
Translation: The rich One's rapture giveth kine.

Sanskit Text: अथा ते अन्तमानां विद्याम सुमतीनाम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: athā te antamānāṃ vidyāma sumatīnām |
Translation: 3 So may we be acquainted with thine innermost benevolence:

Sanskit Text: मा नो अति खय आगहि ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: mā no ati khya āghahi ||
Translation: Neglect us not, come hitherward.

Sanskit Text: परेहि विग्रमस्त्र्तमिन्द्रं पर्छा विपश्चितम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: parehi vighramastṛtamindraṃ pṛchā vipaścitam |
Translation: 4 Go to the wise unconquered One, ask thou of Indra, skilled in song,

Sanskit Text: यस्ते सखिभ्य आ वरम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: yaste sakhibhya ā varam ||
Translation: Him who is better than thy friends.

Sanskit Text: उत बरुवन्तु नो निदो निरन्यतश्चिदारत |
Sanskrit Transliteration: uta bruvantu no nido niranyataścidārata |
Translation: 5 Whether the men who mock us say, Depart unto another place,

Sanskit Text: दधाना इन्द्र इद दुवः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: dadhānā indra id duvaḥ ||
Translation: Ye who serve Indra and none else;

Sanskit Text: उत नः सुभगानरिर्वोचेयुर्दस्म कर्ष्टयः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: uta naḥ subhaghānarirvoceyurdasma kṛṣṭayaḥ |
Translation: 6 Or whether, God of wondrous deeds, all our true people call us blest,

Sanskit Text: सयामेदिन्द्रस्य शर्मणि ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: syāmedindrasya śarmaṇi ||
Translation: Still may we dwell in Indra's care.

Sanskit Text: एमाशुमाशवे भर यज्ञश्रियं नर्मादनम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: emāśumāśave bhara yajñaśriyaṃ nṛmādanam |
Translation: 7 Unto the swift One bring the swift, man-cheering, grace of sacrifice,

Sanskit Text: पतयन मन्दयत्सखम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: patayan mandayatsakham ||
Translation: That to the Friend gives wings and joy.

Sanskit Text: अस्य पीत्वा शतक्रतो घनो वर्त्राणामभवः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: asya pītvā śatakrato ghano vṛtrāṇāmabhavaḥ |
Translation: 8 Thou, Śatakratu, drankest this and wast the Vṛtras’ slayer; thou

Sanskit Text: परावो वाजेषु वाजिनम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: prāvo vājeṣu vājinam ||
Translation: Helpest the warrior in the fray.

Sanskit Text: तं तवा वाजेषु वाजिनं वाजयामः शतक्रतो |
Sanskrit Transliteration: taṃ tvā vājeṣu vājinaṃ vājayāmaḥ śatakrato |
Translation: 9 We strengthen, Śatakratu, thee, yea, thee the powerful in fight,

Sanskit Text: धनानामिन्द्र सातये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: dhanānāmindra sātaye ||
Translation: That, Indra, we may win us wealth.

Sanskit Text: यो रायो.अवनिर्महान सुपारः सुन्वतः सखा |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yo rāyo.avanirmahān supāraḥ sunvataḥ sakhā |
Translation: 10 To him the mighty stream of wealth, prompt friend of him who pours the juice,

Sanskit Text: तस्मा इन्द्राय गायत ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tasmā indrāya ghāyata ||
Translation: Yea, to this Indra sing your song.

Sanskit Text: आ तवेता नि षीदतेन्द्रमभि पर गायत |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ā tvetā ni ṣīdatendramabhi pra ghāyata |
Translation: 1 O COME ye hither, sit ye down: to Indra sing ye forth, your song,

Sanskit Text: सखाय सतोमवाहसः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sakhāya stomavāhasaḥ ||
Translation: companions, bringing hymns of praise.

Sanskit Text: पुरूतमं पुरूणामीशानं वार्याणाम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: purūtamaṃ purūṇāmīśānaṃ vāryāṇām |
Translation: 2 To him the richest of the rich, the Lord of treasures excellent,

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रं सोमे सचा सुते ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indraṃ some sacā sute ||
Translation: Indra, with Soma juice outpoured.

Sanskit Text: स घा नो योग आ भुवत स राये स पुरन्ध्याम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: sa ghā no yogha ā bhuvat sa rāye sa purandhyām |
Translation: 3 May he stand by us in our need and in abundance for our wealth:

Sanskit Text: गमद वाजेभिरा स नः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ghamad vājebhirā sa naḥ ||
Translation: May he come nigh us with his strength.

Sanskit Text: यस्य संस्थे न वर्ण्वते हरी समत्सु शत्रवः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yasya saṃsthe na vṛṇvate harī samatsu śatravaḥ |
Translation: 4 Whose pair of tawny horses yoked in battles foemen challenge not:

Sanskit Text: तस्मा इन्द्राय गायत ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tasmā indrāya ghāyata ||
Translation: To him, to Indra sing your song.

Sanskit Text: सुतपाव्ने सुता इमे शुचयो यन्ति वीतये |
Sanskrit Transliteration: sutapāvne sutā ime śucayo yanti vītaye |
Translation: 5 Nigh to the Soma-drinker come, for his enjoyment, these pure drops,

Sanskit Text: सोमासो दध्याशिरः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: somāso dadhyāśiraḥ ||
Translation: The Somas mingled with the curd.

Sanskit Text: तवं सुतस्य पीतये सद्यो वर्द्धो अजायथाः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tvaṃ sutasya pītaye sadyo vṛddho ajāyathāḥ |
Translation: 6 Thou, grown at once to perfect strength, wast born to drink the Soma juice,

Sanskit Text: इन्द्र जयैष्ठ्याय सुक्रतो ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indra jyaiṣṭhyāya sukrato ||
Translation: Strong Indra, for preëminence.

Sanskit Text: आ तवा विशन्त्वाशवः सोमास इन्द्र गिर्वणः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ā tvā viśantvāśavaḥ somāsa indra ghirvaṇaḥ |
Translation: 7 O Indra, lover of the song, may these quick Somas enter thee:

Sanskit Text: शं ते सन्तु परचेतसे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: śaṃ te santu pracetase ||
Translation: May they bring bliss to thee the Sage.

Sanskit Text: तवां सतोमा अवीव्र्धन तवामुक्था शतक्रतो |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tvāṃ stomā avīvṛdhan tvāmukthā śatakrato |
Translation: 8 Our chants of praise have strengthened thee, O Śatakratu, and our lauds

Sanskit Text: तवां वर्धन्तु नो गिरः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tvāṃ vardhantu no ghiraḥ ||
Translation: So strengthen thee the songs we sing.

Sanskit Text: अक्षितोतिः सनेदिमं वाजमिन्द्रः सहस्रिणम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: akṣitotiḥ sanedimaṃ vājamindraḥ sahasriṇam |
Translation: 9 Indra, whose succour never fails, accept these viands thousandfold,

Sanskit Text: यस्मिन विश्वानि पौंस्या ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: yasmin viśvāni pauṃsyā ||
Translation: Wherein all manly powers abide.

Sanskit Text: मा नो मर्ता अभि दरुहन तनूनामिन्द्र गिर्वणः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: mā no martā abhi druhan tanūnāmindra ghirvaṇaḥ |
Translation: 10 O Indra, thou who lovest song, let no man hurt our bodies, keep

Sanskit Text: ईशानो यवया वधम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: īśāno yavayā vadham ||
Translation: Slaughter far from us, for thou canst.

Sanskit Text: युञ्जन्ति बरध्नमरुषं चरन्तं परि तस्थुषः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yuñjanti bradhnamaruṣaṃ carantaṃ pari tasthuṣaḥ |
Translation: 1 They who stand round him as he moves harness the bright, the ruddy Steed

Sanskit Text: रोचन्तेरोचना दिवि ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: rocanterocanā divi ||
Translation: The lights are shining in the sky.

Sanskit Text: युञ्जन्त्यस्य काम्या हरी विपक्षसा रथे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yuñjantyasya kāmyā harī vipakṣasā rathe |
Translation: 2 On both sides to the car they yoke the two bay coursers dear to him,

Sanskit Text: शोणा धर्ष्णू नर्वाहसा ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: śoṇā dhṛṣṇū nṛvāhasā ||
Translation: Bold, tawny, bearers of the Chief.

Sanskit Text: केतुं कर्ण्वन्नकेतवे पेशो मर्या अपेशसे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ketuṃ kṛṇvannaketave peśo maryā apeśase |
Translation: 3 Thou, making light where no light was, and form, O men: where form was not,

Sanskit Text: समुषद्भिरजायथाः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: samuṣadbhirajāyathāḥ ||
Translation: Wast born together with the Dawns.

Sanskit Text: आदह सवधामनु पुनर्गर्भत्वमेरिरे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ādaha svadhāmanu punargharbhatvamerire |
Translation: 4 Thereafter they, as is their wont, threw off the state of babes unborn,

Sanskit Text: दधाना नामयज्ञियम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: dadhānā nāmayajñiyam ||
Translation: Assuming sacrificial names.

Sanskit Text: वीळु चिदारुजत्नुभिर्गुहा चिदिन्द्र वह्निभिः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: vīḷu cidārujatnubhirghuhā cidindra vahnibhiḥ |
Translation: 5 Thou, Indra, with the Tempest-Gods, the breakers down of what is firm,

Sanskit Text: अविन्द उस्रिया अनु ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: avinda usriyā anu ||
Translation: Foundest the kine even in the cave.

Sanskit Text: देवयन्तो यथा मतिमछा विदद्वसुं गिरः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: devayanto yathā matimachā vidadvasuṃ ghiraḥ |
Translation: 6 Worshipping even as they list, singers laud him who findeth wealth,

Sanskit Text: महामनूषत शरुतम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: mahāmanūṣata śrutam ||
Translation: The far-renowned, the mighty One.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रेण सं हि दर्क्षसे संजग्मानो अबिभ्युषा |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indreṇa saṃ hi dṛkṣase saṃjaghmāno abibhyuṣā |
Translation: 7 Mayest thou verily be seen coming by fearless Indra's side:

Sanskit Text: मन्दू समानवर्चसा ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: mandū samānavarcasā ||
Translation: Both joyous, equal in your sheen.

Sanskit Text: अनवद्यैरभिद्युभिर्मखः सहस्वदर्चति |
Sanskrit Transliteration: anavadyairabhidyubhirmakhaḥ sahasvadarcati |
Translation: 8 With Indra's well beloved hosts, the blameless, hastening to heaven,

Sanskit Text: गणैरिन्द्रस्य काम्यैः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ghaṇairindrasya kāmyaiḥ ||
Translation: The sacrificer cries aloud.

Sanskit Text: अतः परिज्मन्ना गहि दिवो वा रोचनादधि |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ataḥ parijmannā ghahi divo vā rocanādadhi |
Translation: 9 Come from this place, O Wanderer, or downward from the light of heaven:

Sanskit Text: समस्मिन्न्र्ञ्जते गिरः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: samasminnṛñjate ghiraḥ ||
Translation: Our songs of praise all yearn for this.

Sanskit Text: इतो वा सातिमीमहे दिवो वा पार्थिवादधि |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ito vā sātimīmahe divo vā pārthivādadhi |
Translation: 10 Indra we seek to give us help, from here, from heaven above the earth,

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रं महोवा रजसः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indraṃ mahovā rajasaḥ ||
Translation: Or from the spacious firmament.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रमिद गाथिनो बर्हदिन्द्रमर्केभिरर्किणः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indramid ghāthino bṛhadindramarkebhirarkiṇaḥ |
Translation: 1 INDRA the singers with high praise, Indra reciters with their lauds,

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रं वाणीरनूषत ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indraṃ vāṇīranūṣata ||
Translation: Indra the choirs have glorified.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्र इद धर्योः सचा सम्मिश्ल आ वचोयुजा |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indra id dharyoḥ sacā sammiśla ā vacoyujā |
Translation: 2 Indra hath ever close to him his two bay steeds and word-yoked car,

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रो वज्रीहिरण्ययः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indro vajrīhiraṇyayaḥ ||
Translation: Indra the golden, thunder-armed.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रो दीर्घाय चक्षस आ सूर्यं रोहयद दिवि |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indro dīrghāya cakṣasa ā sūryaṃ rohayad divi |
Translation: 3 Indra hath raised the Sun on high in heaven, that he may see afar:

Sanskit Text: वि गोभिरद्रिमैरयत ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: vi ghobhiradrimairayat ||
Translation: He burst the mountain for the kine.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्र वाजेषु नो.अव सहस्रप्रधनेषु च |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indra vājeṣu no.ava sahasrapradhaneṣu ca |
Translation: 4 Help us, O Indra, in the frays, yea, frays, where thousand spoils are gained,

Sanskit Text: उग्र उग्राभिरूतिभिः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ughra ughrābhirūtibhiḥ ||
Translation: With awful aids, O awful One.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रं वयं महाधन इन्द्रमर्भे हवामहे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indraṃ vayaṃ mahādhana indramarbhe havāmahe |
Translation: 5 In mighty battle we invoke Indra, Indra in lesser fight,

Sanskit Text: युजं वर्त्रेषु वज्रिणम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: yujaṃ vṛtreṣu vajriṇam ||
Translation: The Friend who bends his bolt at fiends.

Sanskit Text: स नो वर्षन्नमुं चरुं सत्रादावन्नपा वर्धि |
Sanskrit Transliteration: sa no vṛṣannamuṃ caruṃ satrādāvannapā vṛdhi |
Translation: 6 Unclose, our manly Hero, thou for ever bounteous, yonder cloud,

Sanskit Text: अस्मभ्यमप्रतिष्कुतः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: asmabhyamapratiṣkutaḥ ||
Translation: For us, thou irresistible.

Sanskit Text: तुञ्जे-तुञ्जे य उत्तरे सतोमा इन्द्रस्य वज्रिणः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tuñje-tuñje ya uttare stomā indrasya vajriṇaḥ |
Translation: 7 Still higher, at each strain of mine, thunder-armed Indra's praises rise:

Sanskit Text: न विन्धेस्य सुष्टुतिम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: na vindheasya suṣṭutim ||
Translation: I find no laud worthy of him.

Sanskit Text: वर्षा यूथेव वंसगः कर्ष्टीरियर्त्योजसा |
Sanskrit Transliteration: vṛṣā yūtheva vaṃsaghaḥ kṛṣṭīriyartyojasā |
Translation: 8 Even as the bull drives on the herds, he drives the people with his might,

Sanskit Text: ईशानो अप्रतिष्कुतः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: īśāno apratiṣkutaḥ ||
Translation: The Ruler irresistible:

Sanskit Text: य एकश्चर्षणीनां वसूनामिरज्यति |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ya ekaścarṣaṇīnāṃ vasūnāmirajyati |
Translation: 9 Indra who rules with single sway men, riches, and the fivefold race

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रः पञ्च कसितीनाम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indraḥ pañca ksitīnām ||
Translation: Of those who dwell upon the earth.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रं वो विश्वतस परि हवामहे जनेभ्यः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indraṃ vo viśvatas pari havāmahe janebhyaḥ |
Translation: 10 For your sake from each side we call Indra away from other men:

Sanskit Text: अस्माकमस्तु केवलः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: asmākamastu kevalaḥ ||
Translation: Ours, and none others’, may he be.

Sanskit Text: एन्द्र सानसिं रयिं सजित्वानं सदासहम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: endra sānasiṃ rayiṃ sajitvānaṃ sadāsaham |
Translation: 1 INDRA, bring wealth that gives delight, the victor's ever-conquering wealth,

Sanskit Text: वर्षिष्ठमूतये भर ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: varṣiṣṭhamūtaye bhara ||
Translation: Most excellent, to be our aid;

Sanskit Text: नि येन मुष्टिहत्यया नि वर्त्रा रुणधामहै |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ni yena muṣṭihatyayā ni vṛtrā ruṇadhāmahai |
Translation: 2 By means of which we may repel our foes in battle hand to hand,

Sanskit Text: तवोतासो नयर्वता ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tvotāso nyarvatā ||
Translation: By thee assisted with the car.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्र तवोतास आ वयं वज्रं घना ददीमहि |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indra tvotāsa ā vayaṃ vajraṃ ghanā dadīmahi |
Translation: 3 Aided by thee, the thunder-armed, Indra, may we lift up the bolt,

Sanskit Text: जयेम सं युधि सप्र्धः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: jayema saṃ yudhi spṛdhaḥ ||
Translation: And conquer all our foes in fight.

Sanskit Text: वयं शूरेभिरस्त्र्भिरिन्द्र तवया युजा वयम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: vayaṃ śūrebhirastṛbhirindra tvayā yujā vayam |
Translation: 4 With thee, O India, for ally with missile-darting heroes, may

Sanskit Text: सासह्याम पर्तन्यतः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sāsahyāma pṛtanyataḥ ||
Translation: We conquer our embattled foes.

Sanskit Text: महानिन्द्रः परश्च नु महित्वमस्तु वज्रिणे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: mahānindraḥ paraśca nu mahitvamastu vajriṇe |
Translation: 5 Mighty is Indra, yea supreme; greatness be his, the Thunderer:

Sanskit Text: दयौर्नप्रथिना शवः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: dyaurnaprathinā śavaḥ ||
Translation: Wide as the heaven extends his power

Sanskit Text: समोहे वा य आशत नरस्तोकस्य सनितौ |
Sanskrit Transliteration: samohe vā ya āśata narastokasya sanitau |
Translation: 6 Which aideth those to win them sons, who come as heroes to the fight,

Sanskit Text: विप्रासो वा धियायवः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: viprāso vā dhiyāyavaḥ ||
Translation: Or singers loving holy thoughts.

Sanskit Text: यः कुक्षिः सोमपातमः समुद्र इव पिन्वते |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yaḥ kukṣiḥ somapātamaḥ samudra iva pinvate |
Translation: 7 His belly, drinking deepest draughts of Soma, like an ocean swells,

Sanskit Text: उर्वीरापो न काकुदः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: urvīrāpo na kākudaḥ ||
Translation: Like wide streams from the cope of heaven.

Sanskit Text: एवा हयस्य सून्र्ता विरप्शी गोमती मही |
Sanskrit Transliteration: evā hyasya sūnṛtā virapśī ghomatī mahī |
Translation: 8 So also is his excellence, great, vigorous, rich in cattle, like

Sanskit Text: पक्वा शाखा न दाशुषे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: pakvā śākhā na dāśuṣe ||
Translation: A ripe branch to the worshipper.

Sanskit Text: एवा हि ते विभूतय ऊतय इन्द्र मावते |
Sanskrit Transliteration: evā hi te vibhūtaya ūtaya indra māvate |
Translation: 9 For verily thy mighty powers, Indra, are saving helps at once

Sanskit Text: सद्यश्चित सन्तिदाशुषे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sadyaścit santidāśuṣe ||
Translation: Unto a worshipper like me.

Sanskit Text: एवा हयस्य काम्या सतोम उक्थं च शंस्या |
Sanskrit Transliteration: evā hyasya kāmyā stoma ukthaṃ ca śaṃsyā |
Translation: 10 So are his lovely gifts; let lauds and praises be to Indra sung,

Sanskit Text: इन्द्राय सोमपीतये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indrāya somapītaye ||
Translation: That he may drink the Soma juice.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रेहि मत्स्यन्धसो विश्वेभिः सोमपर्वभिः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indrehi matsyandhaso viśvebhiḥ somaparvabhiḥ |
Translation: 1 COME, Indra, and delight thee with the juice at all the Soma feasts,

Sanskit Text: महानभिष्टिरोजसा ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: mahānabhiṣṭirojasā ||
Translation: Protector, mighty in thy strength.

Sanskit Text: एमेनं सर्जता सुते मन्दिमिन्द्राय मन्दिने |
Sanskrit Transliteration: emenaṃ sṛjatā sute mandimindrāya mandine |
Translation: 2 To Indra pour ye forth the juice, the active gladdening juice to him

Sanskit Text: चक्रिं विश्वानि चक्रये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: cakriṃ viśvāni cakraye ||
Translation: The gladdening, omnific God.

Sanskit Text: मत्स्वा सुशिप्र मन्दिभिः सतोमेभिर्विश्वचर्षणे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: matsvā suśipra mandibhiḥ stomebhirviśvacarṣaṇe |
Translation: 3 O Lord of all men, fair of cheek, rejoice thee in the gladdening lauds,

Sanskit Text: सचैषुसवनेष्वा ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sacaiṣusavaneṣvā ||
Translation: Present at these drink-offerings.

Sanskit Text: अस्र्ग्रमिन्द्र ते गिरः परति तवामुदहासत |
Sanskrit Transliteration: asṛghramindra te ghiraḥ prati tvāmudahāsata |
Translation: 4 Songs have outpoured themselves to thee, Indra, the strong, the guardian Lord,

Sanskit Text: अजोषा वर्षभं पतिम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ajoṣā vṛṣabhaṃ patim ||
Translation: And raised themselves unsatisfied.

Sanskit Text: सं चोदय चित्रमर्वाग राध इन्द्र वरेण्यम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: saṃ codaya citramarvāgh rādha indra vareṇyam |
Translation: 5 Send to us bounty manifold, O Indra, worthy of our wish,

Sanskit Text: असदित ते विभु परभु ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: asadit te vibhu prabhu ||
Translation: For power supreme is only thine.

Sanskit Text: अस्मान सु तत्र चोदयेन्द्र राये रभस्वतः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: asmān su tatra codayendra rāye rabhasvataḥ |
Translation: 6 O Indra, stimulate thereto us emulously fain for wealth,

Sanskit Text: तुविद्युम्न यशस्वतः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tuvidyumna yaśasvataḥ ||
Translation: And glorious, O most splendid One.

Sanskit Text: सं गोमदिन्द्र वाजवदस्मे पर्थु शरवो बर्हत |
Sanskrit Transliteration: saṃ ghomadindra vājavadasme pṛthu śravo bṛhat |
Translation: 7 Give, Indra, wide and lofty fame, wealthy in cattle and in strength,

Sanskit Text: विश्वायुर्धेह्यक्षितम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: viśvāyurdhehyakṣitam ||
Translation: Lasting our life-time, failing not.

Sanskit Text: अस्मे धेहि शरवो बर्हद दयुम्नं सहस्रसातमम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: asme dhehi śravo bṛhad dyumnaṃ sahasrasātamam |
Translation: 8 Grant us high fame, O Indra, grant riches bestowing thousands, those

Sanskit Text: इन्द्र ता रथिनीरिषः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indra tā rathinīriṣaḥ ||
Translation: Fair fruits of earth borne home in wains.

Sanskit Text: वसोरिन्द्रं वसुपतिं गीर्भिर्ग्र्णन्त रग्मियम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: vasorindraṃ vasupatiṃ ghīrbhirghṛṇanta ṛghmiyam |
Translation: 9 Praising with songs the praise-worthy who cometh to our aid, we call

Sanskit Text: होम गन्तारमूतये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: homa ghantāramūtaye ||
Translation: Indra, the Treasure-Lord of wealth.

Sanskit Text: सुते-सुते नयोकसे बर्हद बर्हत एदरिः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: sute-sute nyokase bṛhad bṛhata edariḥ |
Translation: 10 To lofty Indra, dweller by each libation, the pious man

Sanskit Text: इन्द्राय शूषमर्चति ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indrāya śūṣamarcati ||
Translation: Sings forth aloud a strengthening hymn.

Sanskit Text: गायन्ति तवा गायत्रिणो.अर्चन्त्यर्कमर्किणः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ghāyanti tvā ghāyatriṇo.arcantyarkamarkiṇaḥ |
Translation: 1 THE chanters hymn thee, they who say the word of praise magnify thee.

Sanskit Text: बरह्माणस्त्वा शतक्रत उद वंशमिव येमिरे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: brahmāṇastvā śatakrata ud vaṃśamiva yemire ||
Translation: The priests have raised thee up on high, O Śatakratu, like a pole.

Sanskit Text: यत सानोः सानुमारुहद भूर्यस्पष्ट कर्त्वम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yat sānoḥ sānumāruhad bhūryaspaṣṭa kartvam |
Translation: 2 As up he clomb from ridge to ridge and looked upon the toilsome task,

Sanskit Text: तदिन्द्रो अर्थं चेतति यूथेन वर्ष्णिरेजति ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tadindro arthaṃ cetati yūthena vṛṣṇirejati ||
Translation: Indra observes this wish of his, and the Rain hastens with his troop.

Sanskit Text: युक्ष्वा हि केशिना हरी वर्षणा कक्ष्यप्रा |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yukṣvā hi keśinā harī vṛṣaṇā kakṣyaprā |
Translation: 3 Harness thy pair of strong bay steeds, long-maned, whose bodies fill the girths,

Sanskit Text: अथा न इन्द्र सोमपा गिरामुपश्रुतिं चर ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: athā na indra somapā ghirāmupaśrutiṃ cara ||
Translation: And, Indra, Soma-drinker, come to listen to our songs of praise.

Sanskit Text: एहि सतोमानभि सवराभि गर्णीह्या रुव |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ehi stomānabhi svarābhi ghṛṇīhyā ruva |
Translation: 4 Come hither, answer thou the song, sing in approval, cry aloud.

Sanskit Text: बरह्म च नो वसोसचेन्द्र यज्ञं च वर्धय ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: brahma ca no vasosacendra yajñaṃ ca vardhaya ||
Translation: Good Indra, make our prayer succeed, and prosper this our sacrifice.

Sanskit Text: उक्थमिन्द्राय शंस्यं वर्धनं पुरुनिष्षिधे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ukthamindrāya śaṃsyaṃ vardhanaṃ puruniṣṣidhe |
Translation: 5 To Indra must a laud be said, to strengthen him who freely gives,

Sanskit Text: शक्रो यथा सुतेषु णो रारणत सख्येषु च ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: śakro yathā suteṣu ṇo rāraṇat sakhyeṣu ca ||
Translation: That Śakra may take pleasure in our friendship and drink-offerings.

Sanskit Text: तमित सखित्व ईमहे तं राये तं सुवीर्ये |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tamit sakhitva īmahe taṃ rāye taṃ suvīrye |
Translation: 6 Him, him we seek for friendship, him for riches and heroic might.

Sanskit Text: स शक्र उत नः शकदिन्द्रो वसु दयमानः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sa śakra uta naḥ śakadindro vasu dayamānaḥ ||
Translation: For Indra, he is Śakra, he shall aid us while he gives us wealth.

Sanskit Text: सुविव्र्तं सुनिरजमिन्द्र तवादातमिद यशः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: suvivṛtaṃ sunirajamindra tvādātamid yaśaḥ |
Translation: 7 Easy to turn and drive away, Indra, is spoil bestowed by thee.

Sanskit Text: गवामपव्रजं वर्धि कर्णुष्व राधो अद्रिवः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ghavāmapavrajaṃ vṛdhi kṛṇuṣva rādho adrivaḥ ||
Translation: Unclose the stable of the kine, and give us wealth O Thunder-armed

Sanskit Text: नहि तवा रोदसी उभे रघायमाणमिन्वतः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: nahi tvā rodasī ubhe ṛghāyamāṇaminvataḥ |
Translation: 8 The heaven and earth contain thee not, together, in thy wrathful mood.

Sanskit Text: जेषः सवर्वतीरपः सं गा अस्मभ्यं धूनुहि ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: jeṣaḥ svarvatīrapaḥ saṃ ghā asmabhyaṃ dhūnuhi ||
Translation: Win us the waters of the sky, and send us kine abundantly.

Sanskit Text: आश्रुत्कर्ण शरुधी हवं नू चिद दधिष्व मे गिरः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: āśrutkarṇa śrudhī havaṃ nū cid dadhiṣva me ghiraḥ |
Translation: 9 Hear, thou whose ear is quick, my call; take to thee readily my songs

Sanskit Text: इन्द्र सतोममिमं मम कर्ष्वा युजश्चिदन्तरम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indra stomamimaṃ mama kṛṣvā yujaścidantaram ||
Translation: O Indra, let this laud of mine come nearer even than thy friend.

Sanskit Text: विद्मा हि तवा वर्षन्तमं वाजेषु हवनश्रुतम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: vidmā hi tvā vṛṣantamaṃ vājeṣu havanaśrutam |
Translation: 10 We know thee mightiest of all, in battles hearer of our cry.

Sanskit Text: वर्षन्तमस्य हूमह ऊतिं सहस्रसातमाम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: vṛṣantamasya hūmaha ūtiṃ sahasrasātamām ||
Translation: Of thee most mighty we invoke the aid that giveth thousandfold.

Sanskit Text: आ तू न इन्द्र कौशिक मन्दसानः सुतं पिब |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ā tū na indra kauśika mandasānaḥ sutaṃ piba |
Translation: 11 O Indra, Son of Kuśika, drink our libation with delight.

Sanskit Text: नव्यमायुःप्र सू तिर कर्धी सहस्रसां रषिम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: navyamāyuḥpra sū tira kṛdhī sahasrasāṃ ṛṣim ||
Translation: Prolong our life anew, and cause the seer to win a thousand gifts.

Sanskit Text: परि तवा गिर्वणो गिर इमा भवन्तु विश्वतः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: pari tvā ghirvaṇo ghira imā bhavantu viśvataḥ |
Translation: 12 Lover of song, may these our songs on every side encompass thee:

Sanskit Text: वर्द्धायुमनु वर्द्धयो जुष्टा भवन्तु जुष्टयः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: vṛddhāyumanu vṛddhayo juṣṭā bhavantu juṣṭayaḥ ||
Translation: Strengthening thee of lengthened life, may they be dear delights to thee.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रं विश्वा अवीव्र्धन समुद्रव्यचसं गिरः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indraṃ viśvā avīvṛdhan samudravyacasaṃ ghiraḥ |
Translation: 1 ALL sacred songs have magnified Indra expansive as the sea,

Sanskit Text: रथीतमंरथीनां वाजानां सत्पतिं पतिम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: rathītamaṃrathīnāṃ vājānāṃ satpatiṃ patim ||
Translation: The best of warriors borne on cars, the Lord, the very Lord of strength.

Sanskit Text: सख्ये त इन्द्र वाजिनो मा भेम शवसस पते |
Sanskrit Transliteration: sakhye ta indra vājino mā bhema śavasas pate |
Translation: 2 Strong in thy friendship, Indra, Lord of power and might, we have no fear.

Sanskit Text: तवामभि परणोनुमो जेतारमपराजितम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tvāmabhi praṇonumo jetāramaparājitam ||
Translation: We glorify with praises thee, the never-conquered conqueror.

Sanskit Text: पूर्वीरिन्द्रस्य रातयो न वि दस्यन्त्यूतयः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: pūrvīrindrasya rātayo na vi dasyantyūtayaḥ |
Translation: 3 The gifts of Indra from of old, his saving succours, never fail,

Sanskit Text: यदी वाजस्य गोमत सतोत्र्भ्यो मंहते मघम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: yadī vājasya ghomata stotṛbhyo maṃhate magham ||
Translation: When to the praise-singers he gives the boon of substance rich in kine.

Sanskit Text: पुरां भिन्दुर्युवा कविरमितौजा अजायत |
Sanskrit Transliteration: purāṃ bhinduryuvā kaviramitaujā ajāyata |
Translation: 4 Crusher of forts, the young, the wise, of strength unmeasured, was he born

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रो विश्वस्यकर्मणो धर्ता वज्री पुरुष्टुतः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indro viśvasyakarmaṇo dhartā vajrī puruṣṭutaḥ ||
Translation: Sustainer of each sacred rite, Indra, the Thunderer, much-extolled.

Sanskit Text: तवं वलस्य गोमतो.अपावरद्रिवो बिलम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tvaṃ valasya ghomato.apāvaradrivo bilam |
Translation: 5 Lord of the thunder, thou didst burst the cave of Vala rich in cows.

Sanskit Text: तवां देवा अबिभ्युषस्तुज्यमानास आविषुः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tvāṃ devā abibhyuṣastujyamānāsa āviṣuḥ ||
Translation: The Gods came pressing to thy side, and free from terror aided thee,

Sanskit Text: तवाहं शूर रातिभिः परत्यायं सिन्धुमावदन |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tavāhaṃ śūra rātibhiḥ pratyāyaṃ sindhumāvadan |
Translation: 6 I, Hero, through thy bounties am come to the flood addressing thee.

Sanskit Text: उपातिष्ठन्त गिर्वणो विदुष टे तस्य कारवः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: upātiṣṭhanta ghirvaṇo viduṣ ṭe tasya kāravaḥ ||
Translation: Song-lover, here the singers stand and testify to thee thereof.

Sanskit Text: मायाभिरिन्द्र मायिनं तवं शुष्णमवातिरः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: māyābhirindra māyinaṃ tvaṃ śuṣṇamavātiraḥ |
Translation: 7 The wily Śuṣṇa, Indra! thou o’erthrewest with thy wondrous powers.

Sanskit Text: विदुष टे तस्य मेधिरास्तेषां शरवांस्युत तिर ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: viduṣ ṭe tasya medhirāsteṣāṃ śravāṃsyut tira ||
Translation: The wise beheld this deed of thine: now go beyond their eulogies.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रमीशानमोजसाभि सतोमा अनूषत |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indramīśānamojasābhi stomā anūṣata |
Translation: 8 Our songs of praise have glorified Indra who ruleth by his might,

Sanskit Text: सहस्रं यस्य रातय उत वा सन्ति भूयसीः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sahasraṃ yasya rātaya uta vā santi bhūyasīḥ ||
Translation: Whose precious gifts in thousands come, yea, even more abundantly.

Sanskit Text: अग्निं दूतं वर्णीमहे होतारं विश्ववेदसम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aghniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe hotāraṃ viśvavedasam |
Translation: 1 WE choose Agni the messenger, the herald, master of all wealth,

Sanskit Text: अस्य यज्ञस्य सुक्रतुम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: asya yajñasya sukratum ||
Translation: Well skilled in this our sacrifice.

Sanskit Text: अग्निम-अग्निं हवीमभिः सदा हवन्त विश्पतिम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aghnim-aghniṃ havīmabhiḥ sadā havanta viśpatim |
Translation: 2 With callings ever they invoke Agni, Agni, Lord of the House,

Sanskit Text: हव्यवाहं पुरुप्रियम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: havyavāhaṃ purupriyam ||
Translation: Oblation-bearer, much beloved.

Sanskit Text: अग्ने देवानिहा वह जज्ञानो वर्क्तबर्हिषे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aghne devānihā vaha jajñāno vṛktabarhiṣe |
Translation: 3 Bring the Gods hither, Agni, born for him who strews the sacred grass:

Sanskit Text: असि होता न ईड्यः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: asi hotā na īḍyaḥ ||
Translation: Thou art our herald, meet for praise.

Sanskit Text: तानुशतो वि बोधय यदग्ने यासि दूत्यम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tānuśato vi bodhaya yadaghne yāsi dūtyam |
Translation: 4 Wake up the willing Gods, since thou, Agni, performest embassage:

Sanskit Text: देवैरा सत्सि बर्हिषि ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: devairā satsi barhiṣi ||
Translation: Sit on the sacred grass with Gods.

Sanskit Text: घर्ताहवन दीदिवः परति षम रिषतो दह |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ghṛtāhavana dīdivaḥ prati ṣma riṣato daha |
Translation: 5 O Agni, radiant One, to whom the holy oil is poured, burn up

Sanskit Text: अग्ने तवं रक्षस्विनः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: aghne tvaṃ rakṣasvinaḥ ||
Translation: Our enemies whom fiends protect.

Sanskit Text: अग्निनाग्निः समिध्यते कविर्ग्र्हपतिर्युवा |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aghnināghniḥ samidhyate kavirghṛhapatiryuvā |
Translation: 6 By Agni Agni is inflamed, Lord of the House, wise, young, who bears

Sanskit Text: हव्यवाड जुह्वास्यः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: havyavāḍ juhvāsyaḥ ||
Translation: The gift: the ladle is his mouth.

Sanskit Text: कविमग्निमुप सतुहि सत्यधर्माणमध्वरे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: kavimaghnimupa stuhi satyadharmāṇamadhvare |
Translation: 7 Praise Agni in the sacrifice, the Sage whose ways are ever true,

Sanskit Text: देवममीवचातनम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: devamamīvacātanam ||
Translation: The God who driveth grief away.

Sanskit Text: यस्त्वामग्ने हविष्पतिर्दूतं देव सपर्यति |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yastvāmaghne haviṣpatirdūtaṃ deva saparyati |
Translation: 8 God, Agni, be his strong defence who lord of sacrificial gifts,

Sanskit Text: तस्य सम पराविता भव ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tasya sma prāvitā bhava ||
Translation: Worshippeth thee the messenger.

Sanskit Text: यो अग्निं देववीतये हविष्मानाविवासति |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yo aghniṃ devavītaye haviṣmānāvivāsati |
Translation: 9 Whoso with sacred gift would fain call Agni to the feast of Gods,

Sanskit Text: तस्मै पावक मर्ळय ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tasmai pāvaka mṛḷaya ||
Translation: O Purifier, favour him.

Sanskit Text: स नः पावक दीदिवो.अग्ने देवानिहा वह |
Sanskrit Transliteration: sa naḥ pāvaka dīdivo.aghne devānihā vaha |
Translation: 10 Such, Agni, Purifier, bright, bring hither to our sacrifice,

Sanskit Text: उप यज्ञं हविश्च नः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: upa yajñaṃ haviśca naḥ ||
Translation: To our oblation bring the Gods.

Sanskit Text: स न सतवान आ भर गायत्रेण नवीयसा |
Sanskrit Transliteration: sa na stavāna ā bhara ghāyatreṇa navīyasā |
Translation: 11 So lauded by our newest song of praise bring opulence to us,

Sanskit Text: रयिं वीरवतीमिषम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: rayiṃ vīravatīmiṣam ||
Translation: And food, with heroes for our sons.

Sanskit Text: अग्ने शुक्रेण शोचिषा विश्वाभिर्देवहूतिभिः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aghne śukreṇa śociṣā viśvābhirdevahūtibhiḥ |
Translation: 12 O Agni, by effulgent flame, by all invokings of the Gods,

Sanskit Text: इमं सतोमं जुषस्व नः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: imaṃ stomaṃ juṣasva naḥ ||
Translation: Show pleasure in this laud of ours.

Sanskit Text: सुसमिद्धो न आ वह देवानग्ने हविष्मते |
Sanskrit Transliteration: susamiddho na ā vaha devānaghne haviṣmate |
Translation: 1 AGNI, well-kindled, bring the Gods for him who offers holy gifts.

Sanskit Text: होतः पावक यक्षि च ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: hotaḥ pāvaka yakṣi ca ||
Translation: Worship them, Purifier, Priest.

Sanskit Text: मधुमन्तं तनूनपाद यज्ञं देवेषु नः कवे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: madhumantaṃ tanūnapād yajñaṃ deveṣu naḥ kave |
Translation: 2 Son of Thyself, present, O Sage, our sacrifice to the Gods today.

Sanskit Text: अद्या कर्णुहि वीतये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: adyā kṛṇuhi vītaye ||
Translation: Sweet to the taste, that they may feast.

Sanskit Text: नराशंसमिह परियमस्मिन यज्ञ उप हवये |
Sanskrit Transliteration: narāśaṃsamiha priyamasmin yajña upa hvaye |
Translation: 3 Dear Narāśaṁsa, sweet of tongue, the giver of oblations, I

Sanskit Text: मधुजिह्वंहविष्क्र्तम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: madhujihvaṃhaviṣkṛtam ||
Translation: Invoke to this our sacrifice.

Sanskit Text: अग्ने सुखतमे रथे देवानीळित आ वह |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aghne sukhatame rathe devānīḷita ā vaha |
Translation: 4 Agni, on thy most easy car, glorified, hither bring the Gods:

Sanskit Text: असि होता मनुर्हितः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: asi hotā manurhitaḥ ||
Translation: Manu appointed thee as Priest.

Sanskit Text: सत्र्णीत बर्हिरानुषग घर्तप्र्ष्ठं मनीषिणः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: stṛṇīta barhirānuṣagh ghṛtapṛṣṭhaṃ manīṣiṇaḥ |
Translation: 5 Strew, O ye wise, the sacred grass that drips with oil, in order due,

Sanskit Text: यत्राम्र्तस्य चक्षणम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: yatrāmṛtasya cakṣaṇam ||
Translation: Where the Immortal is beheld.

Sanskit Text: वि शरयन्तां रताव्र्धो दवारो देवीरसश्चतः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: vi śrayantāṃ ṛtāvṛdho dvāro devīrasaścataḥ |
Translation: 6 Thrown open be the Doors Divine, unfailing, that assist the rite,

Sanskit Text: अद्या नूनं च यष्टवे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: adyā nūnaṃ ca yaṣṭave ||
Translation: For sacrifice this day and now.

Sanskit Text: नक्तोषासा सुपेशसास्मिन यज्ञ उप हवये |
Sanskrit Transliteration: naktoṣāsā supeśasāsmin yajña upa hvaye |
Translation: 7 I call the lovely Night and Dawn to seat them on the holy grass

Sanskit Text: इदं नो बर्हिरासदे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: idaṃ no barhirāsade ||
Translation: At this our solemn sacrifice.

Sanskit Text: ता सुजिह्वा उप हवये होतारा दैव्या कवी |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tā sujihvā upa hvaye hotārā daivyā kavī |
Translation: 8 The two Invokers I invite, the wise, divine and sweet of tongue,

Sanskit Text: यज्ञं नो यक्षतामिमम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: yajñaṃ no yakṣatāmimam ||
Translation: To celebrate this our sacrifice.

Sanskit Text: इळा सरस्वती मही तिस्रो देवीर्मयोभुवः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: iḷā sarasvatī mahī tisro devīrmayobhuvaḥ |
Translation: 9 Iḷā, Sarasvatī, Mahī, three Goddesses who bring delight,

Sanskit Text: बर्हिः सीदन्त्वस्रिधः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: barhiḥ sīdantvasridhaḥ ||
Translation: Be seated, peaceful, on the grass.

Sanskit Text: इह तवष्टारमग्रियं विश्वरूपमुप हवये |
Sanskrit Transliteration: iha tvaṣṭāramaghriyaṃ viśvarūpamupa hvaye |
Translation: 10 Tvaṣṭar I call, the earliest born, the wearer of all forms at will:

Sanskit Text: अस्माकमस्तुकेवलः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: asmākamastukevalaḥ ||
Translation: May he be ours and ours alone.

Sanskit Text: अव सर्जा वनस्पते देव देवेभ्यो हविः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ava sṛjā vanaspate deva devebhyo haviḥ |
Translation: 11 God, Sovran of the Wood, present this our oblation to the Gods,

Sanskit Text: पर दातुरस्तु चेतनम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: pra dāturastu cetanam ||
Translation: And let the giver be renowned.

Sanskit Text: सवाहा यज्ञं कर्णोतनेन्द्राय यज्वनो गर्हे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: svāhā yajñaṃ kṛṇotanendrāya yajvano ghṛhe |
Translation: 12 With Svāhā pay the sacrifice to Indra in the offerer's house:

Sanskit Text: तत्र देवानुप हवये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tatra devānupa hvaye ||
Translation: Thither I call the Deities.

Sanskit Text: ऐभिरग्ने दुवो गिरो विश्वेभिः सोमपीतये |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aibhiraghne duvo ghiro viśvebhiḥ somapītaye |
Translation: 1 To drink the Soma, Agni, come, to our service and our songs.

Sanskit Text: देवेभिर्याहि यक्षि च ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: devebhiryāhi yakṣi ca ||
Translation: With all these Gods; and worship them.

Sanskit Text: आ तवा कण्वा अहूषत गर्णन्ति विप्र ते धियः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ā tvā kaṇvā ahūṣata ghṛṇanti vipra te dhiyaḥ |
Translation: 2 The Kaṇvas have invoked thee; they, O Singer, sing thee songs of praise

Sanskit Text: देवेभिरग्न आ गहि ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: devebhiraghna ā ghahi ||
Translation: Agni, come hither with the Gods;

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रवायू बर्हस्पतिं मित्राग्निं पूषणं भगम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indravāyū bṛhaspatiṃ mitrāghniṃ pūṣaṇaṃ bhagham |
Translation: 3 Indra, Vāyu, Bṛhaspati, Mitra, Agni, Pūṣan, Bhaga,

Sanskit Text: आदित्यान्मारुतं गणम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ādityānmārutaṃ ghaṇam ||
Translation: Ādityas, and the Marut host.

Sanskit Text: पर वो भरियन्त इन्दवो मत्सरा मादयिष्णवः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: pra vo bhriyanta indavo matsarā mādayiṣṇavaḥ |
Translation: 4 For you these juices are poured forth that gladden and exhilarate,

Sanskit Text: दरप्सा मध्वश्चमूषदः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: drapsā madhvaścamūṣadaḥ ||
Translation: The meath-drops resting in the cup.

Sanskit Text: ईळते तवामवस्यवः कण्वासो वर्क्तबर्हिषः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: īḷate tvāmavasyavaḥ kaṇvāso vṛktabarhiṣaḥ |
Translation: 5 The sons of Kaṇva fain for help adore thee, having strewn the grass,

Sanskit Text: हविष्मन्तोरंक्र्तः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: haviṣmantoaraṃkṛtaḥ ||
Translation: With offerings and all things prepared.

Sanskit Text: घर्तप्र्ष्ठा मनोयुजो ये तवा वहन्ति वह्नयः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ghṛtapṛṣṭhā manoyujo ye tvā vahanti vahnayaḥ |
Translation: 6 Let the swift steeds who carry thee, thought-yoked and dropping holy oil,

Sanskit Text: आ देवान सोमपीतये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ā devān somapītaye ||
Translation: Bring the Gods to the Soma draught.

Sanskit Text: तान यजत्रान रताव्र्धो.अग्ने पत्नीवतस कर्धि |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tān yajatrān ṛtāvṛdho.aghne patnīvatas kṛdhi |
Translation: 7 Adored, the strengtheners of Law, unite them, Agni, with their Dames:

Sanskit Text: मध्वः सुजिह्व पायय ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: madhvaḥ sujihva pāyaya ||
Translation: Make them drink meath, O bright of tongue.

Sanskit Text: ये यजत्रा य ईड्यास्ते ते पिबन्तु जिह्वया |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ye yajatrā ya īḍyāste te pibantu jihvayā |
Translation: 8 Let them, O Agni, who deserve worship and praise drink with thy tongue

Sanskit Text: मधोरग्ने वषट्क्र्ति ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: madhoraghne vaṣaṭkṛti ||
Translation: The meath in solemn sacrifice.

Sanskit Text: आकीं सूर्यस्य रोचनाद विश्वान देवानुषर्बुधः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ākīṃ sūryasya rocanād viśvān devānuṣarbudhaḥ |
Translation: 9 Away, from the Sun's realm of light, the wise invoking Priest shall bring

Sanskit Text: विप्रो होतेह वक्षति ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: vipro hoteha vakṣati ||
Translation: All Gods awaking with the dawn.

Sanskit Text: विश्वेभिः सोम्यं मध्वग्न इन्द्रेण वायुना |
Sanskrit Transliteration: viśvebhiḥ somyaṃ madhvaghna indreṇa vāyunā |
Translation: 10 With all the Gods, with Indra, with Vāyu, and Mitra's splendours, drink,

Sanskit Text: पिबा मित्रस्य धामभिः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: pibā mitrasya dhāmabhiḥ ||
Translation: Agni, the pleasant Soma juice.

Sanskit Text: तवं होता मनुर्हितो.अग्ने यज्ञेषु सीदसि |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tvaṃ hotā manurhito.aghne yajñeṣu sīdasi |
Translation: 11 Ordained by Manu as our Priest, thou sittest, Agni, at each rite:

Sanskit Text: सेमं नो अध्वरं यज ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: semaṃ no adhvaraṃ yaja ||
Translation: Hallow thou this our sacrifice.

Sanskit Text: युक्ष्वा हयरुषी रथे हरितो देव रोहितः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yukṣvā hyaruṣī rathe harito deva rohitaḥ |
Translation: 12 Harness the Red Mares to thy car, the Bays, O God, the flaming ones:

Sanskit Text: ताभिर्देवानिहा वह ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tābhirdevānihā vaha ||
Translation: With those bring hitherward the Gods.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्र सोमं पिब रतुना तवा विशन्त्विन्दवः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indra somaṃ piba ṛtunā tvā viśantvindavaḥ |
Translation: 1 O INDRA drink the Soma juice with Ṛtu; let the cheering drops

Sanskit Text: मत्सरासस्तदोकसः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: matsarāsastadokasaḥ ||
Translation: Sink deep within, which settle there.

Sanskit Text: मरुतः पिबत रतुना पोत्राद यज्ञं पुनीतन |
Sanskrit Transliteration: marutaḥ pibata ṛtunā potrād yajñaṃ punītana |
Translation: 2 Drink from the Purifier's cup, Maruts, with Ṛtu; sanctify

Sanskit Text: यूयं हि षठा सुदानवः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: yūyaṃ hi ṣṭhā sudānavaḥ ||
Translation: The rite, for ye give precious gifts.

Sanskit Text: अभि यज्ञं गर्णीहि नो गनावो नेष्टः पिब रतुना |
Sanskrit Transliteration: abhi yajñaṃ ghṛṇīhi no ghnāvo neṣṭaḥ piba ṛtunā |
Translation: 3 O Neṣṭar, with thy Dame accept our sacrifice; with Ṛtu drink,

Sanskit Text: तवंहि रत्नधा असि ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tvaṃhi ratnadhā asi ||
Translation: For thou art he who giveth wealth.

Sanskit Text: अग्ने देवानिहा वह सादया योनिषु तरिषु |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aghne devānihā vaha sādayā yoniṣu triṣu |
Translation: 4 Bring the Gods, Agni; in the three appointed places set them down:

Sanskit Text: परि भूष पिब रतुना ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: pari bhūṣa piba ṛtunā ||
Translation: Surround them, and with Ṛtu drink.

Sanskit Text: बराह्मणादिन्द्र राधसः पिबा सोमं रतून्रनु |
Sanskrit Transliteration: brāhmaṇādindra rādhasaḥ pibā somaṃ ṛtūnranu |
Translation: 5 Drink Soma after the Ṛtus, from the Brāhmaṇa's bounty: undissolved,

Sanskit Text: तवेद धि सख्यमस्त्र्तम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: taved dhi sakhyamastṛtam ||
Translation: O Indra, is thy friendship's bond.

Sanskit Text: युवं दक्षं धर्तव्रत मित्रावरुण दूळभम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yuvaṃ dakṣaṃ dhṛtavrata mitrāvaruṇa dūḷabham |
Translation: 6 Mitra, Varuṇa, ye whose ways are firm—a Power that none deceives—,

Sanskit Text: रतुना यज्ञमाशाथे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ṛtunā yajñamāśāthe ||
Translation: With Ṛtu ye have reached the rite.

Sanskit Text: दरविणोदा दरविणसो गरावहस्तासो अध्वरे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: draviṇodā draviṇaso ghrāvahastāso adhvare |
Translation: 7 The Soma-pressers, fain for wealth, praise the Wealth-giver in the rite,

Sanskit Text: यज्ञेषु देवमीळते ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: yajñeṣu devamīḷate ||
Translation: In sacrifices praise the God.

Sanskit Text: दरविणोदा ददातु नो वसूनि यानि शर्ण्विरे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: draviṇodā dadātu no vasūni yāni śṛṇvire |
Translation: 8 May the Wealth-giver grant to us riches that shall be far renowned.

Sanskit Text: देवेषु ता वनामहे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: deveṣu tā vanāmahe ||
Translation: These things we gain, among the Gods.

Sanskit Text: दरविणोदाः पिपीषति जुहोत पर च तिष्ठत |
Sanskrit Transliteration: draviṇodāḥ pipīṣati juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata |
Translation: 9 He with the Ṛtu fain would drink, Wealth-giver, from the Neṣṭar's bowl.

Sanskit Text: नेष्ट्राद रतुभिरिष्यत ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: neṣṭrād ṛtubhiriṣyata ||
Translation: Haste, give your offering, and depart.

Sanskit Text: यत तवा तुरीयं रतुभिर्द्रविणोदो यजामहे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yat tvā turīyaṃ ṛtubhirdraviṇodo yajāmahe |
Translation: 10 As we this fourth time, Wealth-giver, honour thee with the Ṛtus, be

Sanskit Text: अध समा नो ददिर्भव ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: adha smā no dadirbhava ||
Translation: A Giver bountiful to us.

Sanskit Text: अश्विना पिबतं मधु दीद्यग्नी शुचिव्रत |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aśvinā pibataṃ madhu dīdyaghnī śucivrata |
Translation: 11 Drink ye the meath, O Aśvins bright with flames, whose acts are pure, who with

Sanskit Text: रतुना यज्ञवाहसा ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ṛtunā yajñavāhasā ||
Translation: Ṛtus accept the sacrifice.

Sanskit Text: गार्हपत्येन सन्त्य रतुना यज्ञनीरसि |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ghārhapatyena santya ṛtunā yajñanīrasi |
Translation: 12 With Ṛtu, through the house-fire, thou, kind Giver, guidest sacrifice:

Sanskit Text: देवान देवयते यज ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: devān devayate yaja ||
Translation: Worship the Gods for the pious man.

Sanskit Text: आ तवा वहन्तु हरयो वर्षणं सोमपीतये |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ā tvā vahantu harayo vṛṣaṇaṃ somapītaye |
Translation: 1 LET thy Bay Steeds bring thee, the Strong, hither to drink the Soma draught—

Sanskit Text: इन्द्र तवा सूरचक्षसः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indra tvā sūracakṣasaḥ ||
Translation: Those, Indra, who are bright as suns.

Sanskit Text: इमा धाना घर्तस्नुवो हरी इहोप वक्षतः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: imā dhānā ghṛtasnuvo harī ihopa vakṣataḥ |
Translation: 2 Here are the grains bedewed with oil: hither let the Bay Coursers bring

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रं सुखतमे रथे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indraṃ sukhatame rathe ||
Translation: Indra upon his easiest car.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रं परातर्हवामह इन्द्रं परयत्यध्वरे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indraṃ prātarhavāmaha indraṃ prayatyadhvare |
Translation: 3 Indra at early morn we call, Indra in course of sacrifice,

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रं सोमस्य पीतये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indraṃ somasya pītaye ||
Translation: Indra to drink the Soma juice.

Sanskit Text: उप नः सुतमा गहि हरिभिरिन्द्र केशिभिः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: upa naḥ sutamā ghahi haribhirindra keśibhiḥ |
Translation: 4 Come hither, with thy long-maned Steeds, O Indra, to he draught we pour

Sanskit Text: सुते हि तवाहवामहे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sute hi tvāhavāmahe ||
Translation: We call thee when the juice is shed.

Sanskit Text: सेमं न सतोमं आ गह्युपेदं सवनं सुतम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: semaṃ na stomaṃ ā ghahyupedaṃ savanaṃ sutam |
Translation: 5 Come thou to this our song of praise, to the libation poured for thee

Sanskit Text: गौरो नत्र्षितः पिब ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ghauro natṛṣitaḥ piba ||
Translation: Drink of it like a stag athirst.

Sanskit Text: इमे सोमास इन्दवः सुतासो अधि बर्हिषि |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ime somāsa indavaḥ sutāso adhi barhiṣi |
Translation: 6 Here are the drops of Soma juice expressed on sacred grass: thereof

Sanskit Text: तानिन्द्र सहसेपिब ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tānindra sahasepiba ||
Translation: Drink, Indra, to increase thy might.

Sanskit Text: अयं ते सतोमो अग्रियो हर्दिस्प्र्गस्तु शन्तमः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ayaṃ te stomo aghriyo hṛdispṛghastu śantamaḥ |
Translation: 7 Welcome to thee be this our hymn, reaching thy heart, most excellent:

Sanskit Text: अथा सोमंसुतं पिब ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: athā somaṃsutaṃ piba ||
Translation: Then drink the Soma juice expressed.

Sanskit Text: विश्वमित सवनं सुतमिन्द्रो मदाय गछति |
Sanskrit Transliteration: viśvamit savanaṃ sutamindro madāya ghachati |
Translation: 8 To every draught of pressed-out juice Indra, the Vṛtra-slayer, comes,

Sanskit Text: वर्त्रहा सोमपीतये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: vṛtrahā somapītaye ||
Translation: To drink the Soma for delight.

Sanskit Text: सेमं नः काममा पर्ण गोभिरश्वैः शतक्रतो |
Sanskrit Transliteration: semaṃ naḥ kāmamā pṛṇa ghobhiraśvaiḥ śatakrato |
Translation: 9 Fulfil, O Śatakratu, all our wish with horses and with kine:

Sanskit Text: सतवाम तवा सवाध्यः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: stavāma tvā svādhyaḥ ||
Translation: With holy thoughts we sing thy praise.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रावरुणयोरहं सम्राजोरव आ वर्णे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indrāvaruṇayorahaṃ samrājorava ā vṛṇe |
Translation: 1 I CRAVE help from the Imperial Lords, from Indra-Varuṇa; may they

Sanskit Text: ता नो मर्ळातीद्र्शे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tā no mṛḷātaīdṛśe ||
Translation: Both favour one of us like me.

Sanskit Text: गन्तारा हि सथो.अवसे हवं विप्रस्य मावतः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ghantārā hi stho.avase havaṃ viprasya māvataḥ |
Translation: 2 Guardians of men, ye ever come with ready succour at the call

Sanskit Text: धर्ताराचर्षणीनाम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: dhartārācarṣaṇīnām ||
Translation: Of every singer such as I.

Sanskit Text: अनुकामं तर्पयेथामिन्द्रावरुण राय आ |
Sanskrit Transliteration: anukāmaṃ tarpayethāmindrāvaruṇa rāya ā |
Translation: 3 Sate you, according to your wish, O Indra-Varuṇa, with wealth:

Sanskit Text: ता वां नेदिष्ठमीमहे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tā vāṃ nediṣṭhamīmahe ||
Translation: Fain would we have you nearest us.

Sanskit Text: युवाकु हि शचीनां युवाकु सुमतीनाम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yuvāku hi śacīnāṃ yuvāku sumatīnām |
Translation: 4 May we be sharers of the powers, sharers of the benevolence

Sanskit Text: भूयाम वाजदाव्नाम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: bhūyāma vājadāvnām ||
Translation: Of you who give strength bounteously.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रः सहस्रदाव्नां वरुणः शंस्यानाम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indraḥ sahasradāvnāṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃsyānām |
Translation: 5 Indra and Varuṇa, among givers of thousands, meet for praise,

Sanskit Text: करतुर्भवत्युक्थ्यः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: kraturbhavatyukthyaḥ ||
Translation: Are Powers who merit highest laud.

Sanskit Text: तयोरिदवसा वयं सनेम नि च धीमहि |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tayoridavasā vayaṃ sanema ni ca dhīmahi |
Translation: 6 Through their protection may we gain great store of wealth, and heap it up

Sanskit Text: सयादुत पररेचनम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: syāduta prarecanam ||
Translation: Enough and still to spare, be ours.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रावरुण वामहं हुवे चित्राय राधसे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indrāvaruṇa vāmahaṃ huve citrāya rādhase |
Translation: 7 O Indra-Varuṇa, on you for wealth in many a form I call:

Sanskit Text: अस्मान सु जिग्युषस कर्तम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: asmān su jighyuṣas kṛtam ||
Translation: Still keep ye us victorious.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रावरुण नू नु वां सिषासन्तीषु धीष्वा |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indrāvaruṇa nū nu vāṃ siṣāsantīṣu dhīṣvā |
Translation: 8 O Indra-Varuṇa, through our songs that seek to win you to ourselves,

Sanskit Text: अस्मभ्यं शर्म यछतम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: asmabhyaṃ śarma yachatam ||
Translation: Give us at once your sheltering help.

Sanskit Text: पर वामश्नोतु सुष्टुतिरिन्द्रावरुण यां हुवे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: pra vāmaśnotu suṣṭutirindrāvaruṇa yāṃ huve |
Translation: 9 O Indra-Varuṇa, to you may fair praise which I offer come,

Sanskit Text: यां रधाथे सधस्तुतिम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: yāṃ ṛdhāthe sadhastutim ||
Translation: Joint eulogy which ye dignify.

Sanskit Text: सोमानं सवरणं कर्णुहि बरह्मणस पते |
Sanskrit Transliteration: somānaṃ svaraṇaṃ kṛṇuhi brahmaṇas pate |
Translation: 1 O BRĀHMAṆASPATI, make him who presses Soma glorious,

Sanskit Text: कक्षीवन्तं याुशिजः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: kakṣīvantaṃ yāuśijaḥ ||
Translation: Even Kakṣīvān Auśija.

Sanskit Text: यो रेवान यो अमीवहा वसुवित पुष्टिवर्धनः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yo revān yo amīvahā vasuvit puṣṭivardhanaḥ |
Translation: 2 The rich, the healer of disease, who giveth wealth, increaseth store,

Sanskit Text: स नः सिषक्तु यस्तुरः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sa naḥ siṣaktu yasturaḥ ||
Translation: The prompt,—may he be with us still.

Sanskit Text: मा नः शंसो अररुषो धूर्तिः परणं मर्त्यस्य |
Sanskrit Transliteration: mā naḥ śaṃso araruṣo dhūrtiḥ praṇaṃ martyasya |
Translation: 3 Let not the foeman's curse, let not a mortal's onslaught fall on us

Sanskit Text: रक्षा णो बरह्मणस पते ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: rakṣā ṇo brahmaṇas pate ||
Translation: Preserve us, Brahmaṇaspati.

Sanskit Text: स घा वीरो न रिष्यति यमिन्द्रो बरह्मणस पतिः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: sa ghā vīro na riṣyati yamindro brahmaṇas patiḥ |
Translation: 4 Ne’er is the mortal hero harmed whom Indra, Brahmaṇaspati,

Sanskit Text: सोमो हिनोति मर्त्यम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: somo hinoti martyam ||
Translation: And Soma graciously inspire.

Sanskit Text: तवं तं बरह्मणस पते सोम इन्द्रश्च मर्त्यम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tvaṃ taṃ brahmaṇas pate soma indraśca martyam |
Translation: 5 Do, thou, O Brahmaṇaspati, and Indra, Soma, Dakṣiṇā,

Sanskit Text: दक्षिणा पात्वंहसः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: dakṣiṇā pātvaṃhasaḥ ||
Translation: Preserve that mortal from distress.

Sanskit Text: सदसस पतिमद्भुतं परियमिन्द्रस्य काम्यम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: sadasas patimadbhutaṃ priyamindrasya kāmyam |
Translation: 6 To the Assembly's wondrous Lord, to Indra's lovely Friend who gives

Sanskit Text: सनिं मेधामयासिषम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: saniṃ medhāmayāsiṣam ||
Translation: Wisdom, have I drawn near in prayer.

Sanskit Text: यस्माद रते न सिध्यति यज्ञो विपश्चितश्चन |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yasmād ṛte na sidhyati yajño vipaścitaścana |
Translation: 7 He without whom no sacrifice, e’en of the wise man, prospers; he

Sanskit Text: स धीनां योगमिन्वति ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sa dhīnāṃ yoghaminvati ||
Translation: Stirs up the series of thoughts.

Sanskit Text: आद रध्नोति हविष्क्र्तिं पराञ्चं कर्णोत्यध्वरम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ād ṛdhnoti haviṣkṛtiṃ prāñcaṃ kṛṇotyadhvaram |
Translation: 8 He makes the oblation prosper, he promotes the course of sacrifice:

Sanskit Text: होत्रा देवेषु गछति ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: hotrā deveṣu ghachati ||
Translation: Our voice of praise goes to the Gods.

Sanskit Text: नराशंसं सुध्र्ष्टममपश्यं सप्रथस्तमम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: narāśaṃsaṃ sudhṛṣṭamamapaśyaṃ saprathastamam |
Translation: 9 I have seen Narāśaṁsa, him most resolute, most widely famed,

Sanskit Text: दिवो नसद्ममखसम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: divo nasadmamakhasam ||
Translation: As ’twere the Household Priest of heaven.

Sanskit Text: परति तयं चारुमध्वरं गोपीथाय पर हूयसे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: prati tyaṃ cārumadhvaraṃ ghopīthāya pra hūyase |
Translation: 1 To this fair sacrifice to drink the milky draught thou art invoked:

Sanskit Text: मरुद्भिरग्न आ गहि ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: marudbhiraghna ā ghahi ||
Translation: O Agni, with the Maruts come.

Sanskit Text: नहि देवो न मर्त्यो महस्तव करतुं परः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: nahi devo na martyo mahastava kratuṃ paraḥ |
Translation: 2 No mortal man, no God exceeds thy mental power, O Mighty one:
O Agni, with the Maruts come:

Sanskit Text: ये महो रजसो विदुर्विश्वे देवासो अद्रुहः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ye maho rajaso vidurviśve devāso adruhaḥ |
Translation: 3 All Gods devoid of guile, who know the mighty region of mid-air:
O Agni, with those Maruts come.

Sanskit Text: य उग्रा अर्कमान्र्चुरनाध्र्ष्टास ओजसा |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ya ughrā arkamānṛcuranādhṛṣṭāsa ojasā |
Translation: 4 The terrible, who sing their song, not to be overcome by might:
O Agni, with those Maruts come.

Sanskit Text: ये शुभ्रा घोरवर्पसः सुक्षत्रासो रिशादसः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ye śubhrā ghoravarpasaḥ sukṣatrāso riśādasaḥ |
Translation: 5 Brilliant, and awful in their form, mighty, devourers of their foes:
O Agni, with those Maruts come.

Sanskit Text: ये नाकस्याधि रोचने दिवि देवास आसते |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ye nākasyādhi rocane divi devāsa āsate |
Translation: 6 Who sit as Deities in heaven, above the sky-vault's luminous sphere:
O Agni, with those Maruts come.

Sanskit Text: य ईङखयन्ति पर्वतान तिरः समुद्रमर्णवम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ya īṅkhayanti parvatān tiraḥ samudramarṇavam |
Translation: 7 Who scatter clouds about the sky, away over the billowy sea:
O Agni, with those Maruts come.

Sanskit Text: आ ये तन्वन्ति रश्मिभिस्तिरः समुद्रमोजसा |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ā ye tanvanti raśmibhistiraḥ samudramojasā |
Translation: 8 Who with their bright beams spread them forth over the ocean in their might
O Agni, with those Maruts come.

Sanskit Text: अभि तवा पूर्वपीतये सर्जामि सोम्यं मधु |
Sanskrit Transliteration: abhi tvā pūrvapītaye sṛjāmi somyaṃ madhu |
Translation: 9 For thee, to be thine early draught, I pour the Soma-mingled meath:
O Agni, with the Maruts come.

Sanskit Text: अयं देवाय जन्मने सतोमो विप्रेभिरासया |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ayaṃ devāya janmane stomo viprebhirāsayā |
Translation: 1 FOR the Celestial Race this song of praise which gives wealth lavishly

Sanskit Text: अकारि रत्नधातमः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: akāri ratnadhātamaḥ ||
Translation: Was made by singers with their lips.

Sanskit Text: य इन्द्राय वचोयुजा ततक्षुर्मनसा हरी |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ya indrāya vacoyujā tatakṣurmanasā harī |
Translation: 2 They who for Indra, with their mind, formed horses harnessed by a word,

Sanskit Text: शमीभिर्यज्ञमाशत ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: śamībhiryajñamāśata ||
Translation: Attained by works to sacrifice.

Sanskit Text: तक्षन नासत्याभ्यां परिज्मानं सुखं रथम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: takṣan nāsatyābhyāṃ parijmānaṃ sukhaṃ ratham |
Translation: 3 They for the two Nāsatyas wrought a light car moving every way:

Sanskit Text: तक्षन धेनुं सबर्दुघाम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: takṣan dhenuṃ sabardughām ||
Translation: They formed a nectar-yielding cow.

Sanskit Text: युवाना पितरा पुनः सत्यमन्त्रा रजूयवः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yuvānā pitarā punaḥ satyamantrā ṛjūyavaḥ |
Translation: 4 The Ṛbhus with effectual prayers, honest, with constant labour, made

Sanskit Text: रभवो विष्ट्यक्रत ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ṛbhavo viṣṭyakrata ||
Translation: Their Sire and Mother young again.

Sanskit Text: सं वो मदासो अग्मतेन्द्रेण च मरुत्वता |
Sanskrit Transliteration: saṃ vo madāso aghmatendreṇa ca marutvatā |
Translation: 5 Together came your gladdening drops with Indra by the Maruts girt,

Sanskit Text: आदित्येभिश्च राजभिः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ādityebhiśca rājabhiḥ ||
Translation: With the Ādityas, with the Kings.

Sanskit Text: उत तयं चमसं नवं तवष्टुर्देवस्य निष्क्र्तम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: uta tyaṃ camasaṃ navaṃ tvaṣṭurdevasya niṣkṛtam |
Translation: 6 The sacrificial ladle, wrought newly by the God Tvaṣṭar's hand—

Sanskit Text: अकर्तचतुरः पुनः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: akartacaturaḥ punaḥ ||
Translation: Four ladles have ye made thereof.

Sanskit Text: ते नो रत्नानि धत्तन तरिरा साप्तानि सुन्वते |
Sanskrit Transliteration: te no ratnāni dhattana trirā sāptāni sunvate |
Translation: 7 Vouchsafe us wealth, to him who pours thrice seven libations, yea, to each

Sanskit Text: एकम-एकंसुशस्तिभिः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ekam-ekaṃsuśastibhiḥ ||
Translation: Give wealth, pleased with our eulogies.

Sanskit Text: अधारयन्त वह्नयो.अभजन्त सुक्र्त्यया |
Sanskrit Transliteration: adhārayanta vahnayo.abhajanta sukṛtyayā |
Translation: 8 As ministering Priests they held, by pious acts they won themselves,

Sanskit Text: भागं देवेषु यज्ञियम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: bhāghaṃ deveṣu yajñiyam ||
Translation: A share in sacrifice with Gods.

Sanskit Text: इहेन्द्राग्नी उप हवये तयोरित सतोममुश्मसि |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ihendrāghnī upa hvaye tayorit stomamuśmasi |
Translation: 1 INDRA and Agni I invoke fain are we for their song of praise:

Sanskit Text: ता सोमं सोमपातमा ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tā somaṃ somapātamā ||
Translation: Chief Soma-drinkers are they both.

Sanskit Text: ता यज्ञेषु पर शंसतेन्द्राग्नी शुम्भता नरः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tā yajñeṣu pra śaṃsatendrāghnī śumbhatā naraḥ |
Translation: 2 Praise ye, O men, and glorify Indra-Agni in the holy rites:

Sanskit Text: ता गायत्रेषु गायत ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tā ghāyatreṣu ghāyata ||
Translation: Sing praise to them in sacred songs.

Sanskit Text: ता मित्रस्य परशस्तय इन्द्राग्नी ता हवामहे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tā mitrasya praśastaya indrāghnī tā havāmahe |
Translation: 3 Indra and Agni we invite, the Soma-drinkers, for the fame

Sanskit Text: सोमपा सोमपीतये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: somapā somapītaye ||
Translation: Of Mitra, to the Soma-draught.

Sanskit Text: उग्रा सन्ता हवामह उपेदं सवनं सुतम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ughrā santā havāmaha upedaṃ savanaṃ sutam |
Translation: 4 Strong Gods, we bid them come to this libation that stands ready here:

Sanskit Text: इन्द्राग्नी एह गछताम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indrāghnī eha ghachatām ||
Translation: Indra and Agni, come to us.

Sanskit Text: ता महान्ता सदस्पती इन्द्राग्नी रक्ष उब्जतम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tā mahāntā sadaspatī indrāghnī rakṣa ubjatam |
Translation: 5 Indra and Agni, mighty Lords of our assembly, crush the fiends:

Sanskit Text: अप्रजाःसन्त्वत्रिणः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: aprajāḥsantvatriṇaḥ ||
Translation: Childless be the devouring ones.

Sanskit Text: तेन सत्येन जाग्र्तमधि परचेतुने पदे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tena satyena jāghṛtamadhi pracetune pade |
Translation: 6 Watch ye, through this your truthfulness, there in the place of spacious view

Sanskit Text: इन्द्राग्नी शर्म यछतम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indrāghnī śarma yachatam ||
Translation: Indra and Agni, send us bliss.

Sanskit Text: परातर्युजा वि बोधयाश्विनावेह गछताम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: prātaryujā vi bodhayāśvināveha ghachatām |
Translation: 1 WAKEN the Aśvin Pair who yoke their car at early morn: may they

Sanskit Text: अस्य सोमस्य पीतये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: asya somasya pītaye ||
Translation: Approach to drink this Soma juice.

Sanskit Text: या सुरथा रथीतमोभा देवा दिविस्प्र्शा |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yā surathā rathītamobhā devā divispṛśā |
Translation: 2 We call the Aśvins Twain, the Gods borne in a noble car, the best

Sanskit Text: अश्विना ता हवामहे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: aśvinā tā havāmahe ||
Translation: Of charioteers, who reach the heavens.

Sanskit Text: या वां कशा मधुमत्यश्विना सून्र्तावती |
Sanskrit Transliteration: yā vāṃ kaśā madhumatyaśvinā sūnṛtāvatī |
Translation: 3 Dropping with honey is your whip, Aśvins, and full of pleasantness

Sanskit Text: तया यज्ञं मिमिक्षतम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tayā yajñaṃ mimikṣatam ||
Translation: Sprinkle therewith the sacrifice.

Sanskit Text: नहि वामस्ति दूरके यत्रा रथेन गछथः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: nahi vāmasti dūrake yatrā rathena ghachathaḥ |
Translation: 4 As ye go thither in your car, not far, O Aśvins, is the home

Sanskit Text: अश्विना सोमिनो गर्हम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: aśvinā somino ghṛham ||
Translation: Of him who offers Soma juice.

Sanskit Text: हिरण्यपाणिमूतये सवितारमुप हवये |
Sanskrit Transliteration: hiraṇyapāṇimūtaye savitāramupa hvaye |
Translation: 5 For my protection I invoke the golden-handed Savitar.

Sanskit Text: स चेत्ता देवतापदम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sa cettā devatāpadam ||
Translation: He knoweth, as a God, the place.

Sanskit Text: अपां नपातमवसे सवितारमुप सतुहि |
Sanskrit Transliteration: apāṃ napātamavase savitāramupa stuhi |
Translation: 6 That he may send us succour, praise the Waters’ Offspring Savitar:

Sanskit Text: तस्य वरतान्युश्मसि ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tasya vratānyuśmasi ||
Translation: Fain are we for his holy ways.

Sanskit Text: विभक्तारं हवामहे वसोश्चित्रस्य राधसः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: vibhaktāraṃ havāmahe vasościtrasya rādhasaḥ |
Translation: 7 We call on him, distributer of wondrous bounty and of wealth,

Sanskit Text: सवितारंन्र्चक्षसम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: savitāraṃnṛcakṣasam ||
Translation: On Savitar who looks on men.

Sanskit Text: सखाय आ नि षीदत सविता सतोम्यो नु नः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: sakhāya ā ni ṣīdata savitā stomyo nu naḥ |
Translation: 8 Come hither, friends, and seat yourselves Savitar, to be praised by us,

Sanskit Text: दाता राधांसि शुम्भति ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: dātā rādhāṃsi śumbhati ||
Translation: Giving good gifts, is beautiful.

Sanskit Text: अग्ने पत्नीरिहा वह देवानामुशतीरुप |
Sanskrit Transliteration: aghne patnīrihā vaha devānāmuśatīrupa |
Translation: 9 O Agni, hither bring to us the willing Spouses of the Gods,

Sanskit Text: तवष्टारं सोमपीतये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: tvaṣṭāraṃ somapītaye ||
Translation: And Tvaṣṭar, to the Soma draught.

Sanskit Text: आ गना अग्न इहावसे होत्रां यविष्ठ भारतीम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ā ghnā aghna ihāvase hotrāṃ yaviṣṭha bhāratīm |
Translation: 10 Most youthful Agni, hither bring their Spouses, Hotrā, Bhāratī,

Sanskit Text: वरूत्रीं धिषणां वह ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: varūtrīṃ dhiṣaṇāṃ vaha ||
Translation: Varūtrī, Dhiṣaṇā, for aid.

Sanskit Text: अभी नो देवीरवसा महः शर्मणा नर्पत्नीः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: abhī no devīravasā mahaḥ śarmaṇā nṛpatnīḥ |
Translation: 11 Spouses of Heroes, Goddesses, with whole wings may they come to us

Sanskit Text: अछिन्नपत्राः सचन्ताम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: achinnapatrāḥ sacantām ||
Translation: With great protection and with aid.

Sanskit Text: इहेन्द्राणीमुप हवये वरुणानीं सवस्तये |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ihendrāṇīmupa hvaye varuṇānīṃ svastaye |
Translation: 12 Indrāṇī, Varuṇānī, and Agnāyī hither I invite,

Sanskit Text: अग्नायीं सोमपीतये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: aghnāyīṃ somapītaye ||
Translation: For weal, to drink the Soma juice.

Sanskit Text: मही दयौः पर्थिवी च न इमं यज्ञं मिमिक्षताम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: mahī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca na imaṃ yajñaṃ mimikṣatām |
Translation: 13 May Heaven and Earth, the Mighty Pair, bedew for us our sacrifice,

Sanskit Text: पिप्र्तां नो भरीमभिः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: pipṛtāṃ no bharīmabhiḥ ||
Translation: And feed us full with nourishments.

Sanskit Text: तयोरिद घर्तवत पयो विप्रा रिहन्ति धीतिभिः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tayorid ghṛtavat payo viprā rihanti dhītibhiḥ |
Translation: 14 Their water rich with fatness, there in the Gandharva's steadfast place,

Sanskit Text: गन्धर्वस्य धरुवे पदे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ghandharvasya dhruve pade ||
Translation: The singers taste through sacred songs.

Sanskit Text: सयोना पर्थिवि भवान्र्क्षरा निवेशनी |
Sanskrit Transliteration: syonā pṛthivi bhavānṛkṣarā niveśanī |
Translation: 15 Thornless be thou, O Earth, spread wide before us for a dwelling-place:

Sanskit Text: यछा नः शर्म सप्रथः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: yachā naḥ śarma saprathaḥ ||
Translation: Vouchsafe us shelter broad and sure.

Sanskit Text: अतो देवा अवन्तु नो यतो विष्णुर्विचक्रमे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ato devā avantu no yato viṣṇurvicakrame |
Translation: 16 The Gods be gracious unto us even from the place whence Viṣṇu strode

Sanskit Text: पर्थिव्याः सप्तधामभिः ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: pṛthivyāḥ saptadhāmabhiḥ ||
Translation: Through the seven regions of the earth!

Sanskit Text: इदं विष्णुर्वि चक्रमे तरेधा नि दधे पदम |
Sanskrit Transliteration: idaṃ viṣṇurvi cakrame tredhā ni dadhe padam |
Translation: 17 Through all this world strode Viṣṇu; thrice his foot he planted, and the whole

Sanskit Text: समूळ्हमस्य पांसुरे ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: samūḷhamasya pāṃsure ||
Translation: Was gathered in his footstep's dust.

Sanskit Text: तरीणि पदा वि चक्रमे विष्णुर्गोपा अदाभ्यः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: trīṇi padā vi cakrame viṣṇurghopā adābhyaḥ |
Translation: 18 Viṣṇu, the Guardian, he whom none deceiveth, made three steps; thenceforth

Sanskit Text: अतो धर्माणि धारयन ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: ato dharmāṇi dhārayan ||
Translation: Establishing his high decrees.

Sanskit Text: विष्णोः कर्माणि पश्यत यतो वरतानि पस्पशे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi paśyata yato vratāni paspaśe |
Translation: 19 Look ye on Viṣṇu's works, whereby the Friend of Indra, close-allied,

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रस्य युज्यः सखा ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: indrasya yujyaḥ sakhā ||
Translation: Hath let his holy ways be seen.

Sanskit Text: तद विष्णोः परमं पदं सदा पश्यन्ति सूरयः |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ |
Translation: 20 The princes evermore behold that loftiest place where Viṣṇu is,

Sanskit Text: दिवीव चक्षुराततम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: divīva cakṣurātatam ||
Translation: Laid as it were an eye in heaven.

Sanskit Text: तद विप्रासो विपन्यवो जाग्र्वांसः समिन्धते |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tad viprāso vipanyavo jāghṛvāṃsaḥ samindhate |
Translation: 21 This, Viṣṇu's station most sublime, the singers, ever vigilant,

Sanskit Text: विष्णोर्यत परमं पदम ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: viṣṇoryat paramaṃ padam ||
Translation: Lovers of holy song, light up.

Sanskit Text: तीव्राः सोमास आ गह्याशीर्वन्तः सुता इमे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: tīvrāḥ somāsa ā ghahyāśīrvantaḥ sutā ime |
Translation: 1 STRONG are the Somas; come thou nigh; these juices have been mixt with milk:

Sanskit Text: वायो तान परस्थितान पिब ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: vāyo tān prasthitān piba ||
Translation: Drink, Vāyu, the presented draughts.

Sanskit Text: उभा देवा दिविस्प्र्शेन्द्रवायू हवामहे |
Sanskrit Transliteration: ubhā devā divispṛśendravāyū havāmahe |
Translation: 2 Both Deities who touch the heaven, Indra and Vāyu we invoke

Sanskit Text: अस्य सोमस्य पीतये ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: asya somasya pītaye ||
Translation: To drink of this our Soma juice.

Sanskit Text: इन्द्रवायू मनोजुवा विप्रा हवन्त ऊतये |
Sanskrit Transliteration: indravāyū manojuvā viprā havanta ūtaye |
Translation: 3 The singers' for their aid, invoke Indra and Vāyu, swift as mind,

Sanskit Text: सहस्राक्षा धियस पती ||
Sanskrit Transliteration: sahasrākṣā dhiyas patī ||
Translation: The thousand-eyed, the Lords of thought.

Sanskit Text: मित्रं वयं हवामहे वरुणं सोमपीतये |
Sanskrit Transliteration: mitraṃ vayaṃ havāmahe varuṇaṃ somapītaye |
